text:
Thank you for donating!

Together we are building a movement that will win the nomination, defeat Donald Trump, and transform our country. Thank you for being a part of it.

Scroll down to learn more about our campaign and how you can get involved.
title: Bernie Sanders - Official Campaign Website

meta_data.description: Change will never come without political participation. Join the political revolution today.
